Bibliographic References: PP, no. 35, fig. 16; PPSupp, no. 45; PhV2, p. 33, no. 32; Neverov, Kultura, ill. on p. 151; Kurt Galinsky. The Herakles Theme, p. 95, pi. 9, fig. 12
Imagery Description: (a) Phlyax scene—Herakles threatening Apollo at Delphi, (b) draped woman, holding cista, and nude youth with fillet and tambourine
